title: BRIEF-Paget Minerals Corp. Agrees To Reverse Takeover Transaction With Ascent Industries Corp.
text:
April 30, 2018 / 12:50 PM / Updated 22 minutes ago BRIEF-Paget Minerals Corp. Agrees To Reverse Takeover Transaction With Ascent Industries Corp. Reuters Staff
April 30 (Reuters) - Paget Minerals Corp:
* PAGET MINERALS CORP. AGREES TO REVERSE TAKEOVER TRANSACTION WITH ASCENT INDUSTRIES CORP.
* PAGET MINERALS - PRIOR DEAL COMPLETION, ASCENT WILL COMPLETE BROKERED PRIVATE PLACEMENT OF SUBSCRIPTION RECEIPTS FOR GROSS PROCEEDS OF UP TO C$30 MILLION Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage: (Reuters.Briefs@thomsonreuters.com)
